description: Lists the deployment groups for an application registered with the Amazon Web Services user or Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: The name of an CodeDeploy application associated with the user or Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: deploymentGroups
nested_items.description: A list of deployment group names.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If a large amount of information is returned, an identifier is also returned. It can be used in a subsequent list deployment groups call to return the next set of deployment groups in the list.
